Name: Exorcist Fairy
About the game: Introduction/h2] 'Xuan Nu Zhu Mo Lu' is a traditional style 2D action adventure game. Players will fight with many demons in many scenes, meet and help the innocent, and finally uncover the truth of the ten thousand demons grottoes and Xuannv. Features Detailed 2D hand-painted art All the materials in this game are hand-drawn. Beautiful and lovely girl The protagonist of the game is a young, beautiful and superb martial arts girl with more than 200 frames of full hand-painted animation. Exquisite character drawing There are many exquisite characters in the game. Rich 2D action elements In the game, players can operate the protagonist to move, jump, double jump, sprint, climb, hang, combo, use spirit power and many other actions, and can use various means to kill the enemy. Exploring the interconnected world Players' adventure will be explored in many huge and different styles of the world, such as deep temples, evil caves and so on! Dozens of strange enemies with different styles Many demons enemies and epic level demons! Face and kill the most evil demons in the adventure!
